title: Lord of the Rings: 16 Small Details Only Fans Noticed

media:group.media:title: Lord of the Rings: 16 Small Details Only Fans Noticed
media:group.media:description:
The full extended edition of the Lord of the Rings Trilogy clocks in at just about 11 hours and 20 minutes. With so much dense character and world building it can be hard to catch just how connected the world of Middle Earth really is. Like the incestious family history of Galadriel. Or how Sauron made sure that nobody ever could destroy the Ring. In this video we’ll bring to you just 20 of the near endless things you could miss in the Lord of the Rings. And while it is not needed, watching the extended edition of these movies is highly recommended.

8:57 - Everyone is Related

11:52 - Saruman’s Death
12:53 - Christopher Lee
13:27 - The Ring’s Power
